Yeah, I played against her today combined with Incap Wonder Woman. So Harley keeps sticking a token on me, lowering my defense at least 1 because of Wonder Woman’s special. I kept from probing an attack because I would rather have the point of damage she gave after I reduced it than to take another token and decrease my DV more. She’s another that would help First Born.
April 25, 2021
fastcat99
This piece is definitely all crazy in a pretty little package. She kept a team tied up for almost five rounds with missing her quakes and giving 3 or 4 characters a token each time. Set her next to Golden Armor WW for the 19 defend and wow. Everything about her dial is useful and effective. Probably my favorite out of the set so far.
